algorithm_technique: frequency counting and tracking first/last occurrences
problem_summary_simple: Find the shortest subarray with the same maximum frequency of any element.
problem_summary_technical: Use a hashmap to store counts, first, and last indices of elements to find the shortest subarray.
key_insights: The degree of the array is the maximum frequency of any element.
To find the shortest subarray, we need to track the first and last occurrences of elements with the maximum frequency.
A single pass can collect all necessary information (counts, first/last indices).
